description: Tropical, refreshing and perfect on a warm day or balmy evening, this magical mocktail features refreshing watermelon with muddled lychee and mint.
name: Lychee, Watermelon & Mint Mocktail Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Juice 2 limes and cut remaining lime into wedges. Place lime juice and lychees in a large jug. Using a muddler or wooden spoon, mash lychees slightly to release juice. Stir in coconut water.
Divide watermelon wedges among 4 x 450ml glasses, then fill with ice.
Divide lychee mixture among glasses. Top up each glass with lemonade and garnish with mint. Serve with lime wedges.
